meanings.definition: To form a team or work together as a team.
meanings.sent1: The students were teaming up to complete the project.
meanings.sent2: The athletes were teaming together to win the game.
meanings.sent3: The ants were teaming up to carry the food back to their nest.
meanings.sent4: The stars were teaming in the night sky, creating a beautiful constellation.
meanings.sent5: The firefighters were teaming to put out the blazing fire.

meanings.definition: A group of people working together as a team.
meanings.sent1: The teaming of doctors saved many lives during the emergency.
meanings.sent2: The teaming in the office led to a successful project completion.
meanings.sent3: The teaming of animals in the jungle was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The teaming of colors in the painting created a stunning masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The teaming of musicians on stage produced a harmonious melody.
